title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-3.10 - Severability clause
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-3.10 - Severability clause

State Regulations

Each provision of this Part shall be deemed severable, and in the event that any provision o f this Part is held to be in valid, the
remainder of this Part will continue in full force and
effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
231-3.10

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
